segments.text: What ? You're suddenly some kind of coffee snob now ? What's a ristretto anyway ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's basically a very strong espresso . Half the water pulled through the same amount of beans . Pure coffee essence .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds like it must be just full of caffeine . I want one of those instead !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You fiend . It's about the flavor , not the fix . Why don't you just crush some caffeine pills and start doing lines ?
segments.speaker: S1
